function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruptions in supply chains due to travel restrictions and lack of key workers","Impact":"Impact on availability of vital goods and services, including food and medicine","Mitigation":"Implement targeted travel restrictions, monitor buying behavior, use IoT systems for effective distribution and tracking of goods","Technologies":"IoT, AI, UAVs, blockchain","People":"General population, workers in supply chain","Owner":"Governments, logistics companies"},{"Description":"High-risk face-to-face encounters due to supply chain disruptions","Impact":"Increased transmission risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Adoption of smart distribution and delivery systems, increase in online shopping, use of IoT-and AI-enabled technologies","Technologies":"IoT, AI, UAVs, blockchain","People":"General population, workers in supply chain","Owner":"Governments, logistics companies"}]}
